summary: SummaryThe original, viral sensation! Charlotte Tilbury's Hollywood Flawless Filter is a primer, skin perfector, complexion booster, and highlighter all in one, creating a real-life filter effect.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe original viral sensation that blurs, smooths & illuminatesWith 4 easy ways to wear: wear it alone, as a primer, mixed with foundation, or as a highlighterLightweight & long-lastingLuminous glow + real-life filter effectSheer, illuminating coverageKey IngredientsSmoothing airbrush polymers for a poreless, flawless looking finish; light-as-air, moisturizing glossy oilFinely milled powders to help blur the appearance of lines & poresBrightening Porcelain flower extract, derived from a Thai flower for brighter looking skinResearch ResultsHydrates skin for up to 24 hours*97% agree the product is like nothing else**94% agree the product lasted all day**96% agree it gives skin a real-life filter effect**100% agree skin looks glowing**99% agree skin looks more youthful***Clinically tested on 30 people.**300 people tested over 1 week.Item 2632469How To UseFresh Radiance: Wear on its own for a fresh, youthful-looking radiance that's perfect for the gym and 'no-makeup' makeup days.Glow Prime: Wear underneath foundation to create a smoother looking, radiant canvas.Soft Radiance: Mix with your favourite foundation for a dewy, illuminated, flawless looking complexion on date night.Highlighted Radiance: Apply over your foundation to the tops of your cheekbones, down your nose and Cupid's bow to wear as a highlighter and illuminate the high-points of your face for any event.Ingredients4.5 Medium: Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydrogenated Didecene, Mica, Glycerin, Propanediol, Squalane, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Isoamyl Laurate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Hoya Lacunosa Flower Extract, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Fresh Radiance: Wear on its own for a fresh, youthful-looking radiance that's perfect for the gym and 'no-makeup' makeup days.Glow Prime: Wear underneath foundation to create a smoother looking, radiant canvas.Soft Radiance: Mix with your favourite foundation for a dewy, illuminated, flawless looking complexion on date night.Highlighted Radiance: Apply over your foundation to the tops of your cheekbones, down your nose and Cupid's bow to wear as a highlighter and illuminate the high-points of your face for any event.
ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Such a flawless look and feels so hydrating.

reviews.headline: Full coverage foundation
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Super high coverage and good quality. The shade was a little dark for me, but the foundation itself was really good! Packaging is nice with the applicator making it easy to go on. It has a nice matte finish with no scent!

reviews.headline: my foundation- don't ever take it away!
reviews.comments: this product is what i use for foundation! it is THAT good. it covers the blemishes pretty well like a serum and leaves a beautiful radiance behind. i only spot conceal after and use powder to set it. the ingredients are also clean. please don't ever stop selling it

reviews.headline: Yessss Please
reviews.comments: I love the shiny airbrush effect this gives my skin. This is totally worth the price. If you pair it with creme or liquid blush and bronzer it gives the airbrush effect. This is definitely by far one of my best foundation. It is in the name (Hollywood Flawless Filter) honestly does look like the stuff celebrity's use. If you do not know if you should get it just go for it !!!!
reviews.nickname: I Love Everything About You Shia LaBeouf

reviews.headline: My desert island product.
reviews.comments: I love this. It is like the sheerest, glowy-est foundation that's not a foundation. It blurs imperfections without any heaviness. It provides a glow without sparkle or sheen. It's not shiny just makes skin have an inner glow. My skin looks transformed when I use it both under blusher and concealer and over it.

reviews.headline: Would buy something different next time
reviews.comments: Bought it after trying it on my hand. It makes my face look greasy and shiny even after using powder after.

reviews.headline: Flawless
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using Charlotte Tilbury's Hollywood Flawless Filter in the shade 7 Deep for a few months now, and it's quickly become a go-to in my makeup routine, especially when I'm aiming for that sun-kissed, bronzed glow.

First off, the formula is absolutely stunning. It has this smooth, almost serum-like consistency that feels lightweight on the skin but still provides a noticeable glow. It's not glittery or overly shimmery, but rather gives off this healthy, lit-from-within finish. The shade 7 Deep is perfect for deeper skin tones or to use as a bronzer for lighter skin- it's a warm, rich bronze with just the right amount of depth to contour without looking too harsh.

For a sun-kissed look, I like to use it both as a bronzer and a contour product. I start by applying a few dots of the Hollywood Flawless Filter on the high points of my face where the sun would naturally hit—my cheekbones, bridge of the nose, and forehead. It blends out seamlessly into my skin and gives me that effortless warmth. I also use it under my cheekbones and along my jawline for contouring. The formula blends beautifully with just a damp beauty sponge or a brush, and it doesn't move the foundation underneath, which is a huge plus.

What's also great about this product is its versatility—it works beautifully alone for a more natural, dewy look or as a base under foundation for an extra layer of glow. I sometimes mix a little bit into my foundation for an all-over radiance, and it just elevates the finish to a whole new level.

Overall, 7 Deep is my secret weapon for achieving that perfect bronzed, sun-kissed glow without overdoing it. It's such a luxe product and a game-changer in my makeup bag. It doesn't settle into fine lines or emphasize texture, and it stays put throughout the day. Definitely a must-try if you're looking for that flawless, bronzed effect.

reviews.headline: Sheen & Natural
reviews.comments: I received this in exchange of a review! If you're looking for something lightweight with medium coverage this is definitely the one for you! Formula is definitely flawless and does make you look like you have filtered all the little imperfections you may or may not have on your skin, but it covered mine beautifully! Still leaves a very light sheen on the face and makes it look very natural perfect for every day wear and nothing too heavy!

reviews.headline: Too sheer
reviews.comments: Its a pretty tone but its too sheer and didn't cover any of my freckles.

reviews.headline: My new product
reviews.comments: The glow this foundation gives is amazing, love the natural look it gives you, even without makeup, this was exactly what I was looking for. You get what you pay for and it is worth it.

reviews.headline: I don't know why everyone loves this product
reviews.comments: I am an avid user of Estée Lauder products but because of all the hype around Charlottes products I wanted to give it a try.  I'm sorry I did.  This product settled in creases, caked on the chin and overall didn't look good.  I will stay with my go to.

reviews.headline: Overpriced for coverage
reviews.comments: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I didn't really care for it, tbh. The wear isn't anything special to me, but more than anything the coverage was pathetic. I get equal coverage from beauty supply concealer for significantly cheaper. It's also VERY red, which sucks because I try to neutralize under eye bags. Won't be using this.

reviews.headline: Really beautiful
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Beautiful color and shimmer. Beware that if you do use it all over you can look shinier than dewy (in my experience). I used more like a highlighter and thought that looked best.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I have never had a foundation from an online source match as perfect as this one did.  I am blown away!  I have very difficult to match tone due to my Olive complexion and it makes these online tasks difficult when I get foundation usually the tone is off it's too pink or orange but this is absolutely perfect. It's great to use with a brush or a sponge and it blends like a dream. 

 It causes no outbreaks and hides those little imperfections that we all hate. I had absolutely no skin issues whatsoever and I would recommend this for anyone that has problems with having a difficult to match skin type.

reviews.headline: A must have in the makeup bag
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using flawless filter for ages and it is hands down the best makeup highlighter on the market. Love the gold packaging. I use it on my décolletage and my shoulders when I want a little extra glow, but it blends so well and pairs with any makeup. Never looks like too much highlight and can easy build on it or not. It's really up to what you want. Never really notice much of a scent. It's not drying or irritating and can even be worn alone. Just do much versatility.

reviews.headline: Amazing multi use product
reviews.comments:
This Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Flawless Filter is a gorgeous and extremely blendable multi use product! It is quite sheer, so there are probably a range of shades which may work depending on someone's needs. I prefer this as a liquid bronzer or to use under my makeup if I want to add a bronze glow to my skin!

The glass packaging is heavy and luxurious, adding to the luxury CT experience. I love how the wand is big enough for product usage as a base, bronzer, highlighter, etc. depending on the shade chosen!

reviews.headline: Lit from within, candlelight glow
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This gives your skin a really beautiful, natural, lit from within glow! I can absolutely see how this became so popular! I love the bottle, the doe foot applicator, and how versatile this formula is (you can apply it as a primer, glowy skin tint, mix with other products, apply on top of foundation as a highlighter, etc.). 
The only reason I didn't give it the full five stars is because there are so many other products like it on the market now! And they're more affordable, more accessible, and give the same affect.

reviews.headline: Glowy glass vibes!!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] OK, I am obsessed with this product! The bottle is stunning. I love the gold cap. It has medium sized applicator, which you  use to apply product to your face and then buff it with a foundation brush. So one of the many things I love about this product is that you can use it several ways, first you can use it by itself, which is what I like to do for a glowy no make up make up look /glass like finish. You can use it as a primer or you can mix it in with your foundation and lastly, you can apply it over your foundation as like a highlighter. Non scented. This product just make my skin look so good!!! Spreads evenly, doesn't crease, light weight! You don't even need primer! Definitely but this if you love a glowy sheen look!✨

reviews.headline: Radiant
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. Charlotte Tilbury's Hollywood Flawless Filter is a versatile complexion booster that imparts a radiant, dewy glow. Its lightweight formula, enriched with ingredients like glycerin and squalane, hydrates the skin while blurring imperfections. Suitable for various skin types, it can be used alone, under foundation, or as a highlighter. The product is available in a range of shades to complement different skin tones.

reviews.headline: Perfect for your base routine!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I really love this product! It's so glowy and going in with a darker shade allowed me to underpaying for a flawless bronzed glow. Mixed well with my foundation. I love the big applicator it comes with, allowing for a flawless application.

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using Charlotte Tilbury's Hollywood Flawless Filter in the shade 7 Deep for a few months now, and it's quickly become a go-to in my makeup routine, especially when I'm aiming for that sun-kissed, bronzed glow.

First off, the formula is absolutely stunning. It has this smooth, almost serum-like consistency that feels lightweight on the skin but still provides a noticeable glow. It's not glittery or overly shimmery, but rather gives off this healthy, lit-from-within finish. The shade 7 Deep is perfect for deeper skin tones or to use as a bronzer for lighter skin- it's a warm, rich bronze with just the right amount of depth to contour without looking too harsh.

For a sun-kissed look, I like to use it both as a bronzer and a contour product. I start by applying a few dots of the Hollywood Flawless Filter on the high points of my face where the sun would naturally hit—my cheekbones, bridge of the nose, and forehead. It blends out seamlessly into my skin and gives me that effortless warmth. I also use it under my cheekbones and along my jawline for contouring. The formula blends beautifully with just a damp beauty sponge or a brush, and it doesn't move the foundation underneath, which is a huge plus.

What's also great about this product is its versatility—it works beautifully alone for a more natural, dewy look or as a base under foundation for an extra layer of glow. I sometimes mix a little bit into my foundation for an all-over radiance, and it just elevates the finish to a whole new level.

Overall, 7 Deep is my secret weapon for achieving that perfect bronzed, sun-kissed glow without overdoing it. It's such a luxe product and a game-changer in my makeup bag. It doesn't settle into fine lines or emphasize texture, and it stays put throughout the day. Definitely a must-try if you're looking for that flawless, bronzed effect.
faceoff_positive.headline: Flawless

faceoff_negative.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I was really excited to try the Charlotte Tilbury Flawless Filter because of all the hype around it. I got the shade 4 Medium, and the shade match was pretty good for my skin tone. When I first tried it, I applied it all over my face like a foundation, but I didn't like how it looked on its own. It sits better under foundation, but you have to be careful not to use too much or it looks weird.  If you have textured or acne-prone skin, this might not be the best fit despite the fact that it's called flawless filter. I've noticed that sometimes my skin actually looks more textured with this, which is disappointing. That being said, I do love using it as a subtle highlighter—it gives a very natural glow without being glittery. Since this is a luxury product, the price is definitely on the higher side. They do offer a mini version, which is great if you want to test it first—but unfortunately, they have limited shades, and 4 Medium isn't available in the mini. 

Another thing that could be improved is the packaging. The doe-foot applicator makes it tricky to mix with foundation if you prefer that method, and since the bottle is narrow, I worry about getting all the product out over time. A pump would have been so much better for versatility. Overall, this isn't a bad product, it has its moments when used the right way. But I do think it's overhyped! If you love a natural, dewy glow and don't have a lot of texture, you might enjoy this. But if you're looking for something that truly smooths and blurs, you might be disappointed. For the price and the hype, I was expecting a bit more.
faceoff_negative.headline: Ok but not great
